item.title: Particl Basics #2: Staking
item.description: We’re already familiar with Particl’s privacy coin, so let’s see how it can work for you – it’s time to get into staking.

item.title: Particl Basics #1: The privacy coin
item.description: Welcome to our new series of bite-sized “get to know Particl” articles! Let’s at the core of the whole platform — the PART coin.
